item.title: 0968 GILD
item.description: score:968 Chances: Gilead Sciences expects a third of sales to come from its cancer treatments by 2030, which could drive future growth. Gilead Sciences has a rich portfolio of therapies for life-threatening infectious diseases, including pulmonary and cardiovascular diseases and cancer. The company’s CEO mentioned that Gilead is overperforming significantly, excluding one-time items, indicating positive performance.
